Temporarily same as nuclear_conv - was 37_642_000 or 1 billion euros for a 300 MW reactor according to https://fermi.ee/en/bwrx-300/- There is a capital_cost competing claim from https://ieefa.org/sites/default/files/2024-05/SMRs%20Still%20Too%20Expensive%20Too%20Slow%20Too%20Risky_May%202024.pdf

Intended to represent the ceiling price in the system
The discount rate used in the model is 4%
